properties.displayName: Suspicious Vsls-Agent Command With AgentExtensionPath Load
properties.query:
DeviceProcessEvents
| where (ProcessCommandLine contains "--agentExtensionPath" and FolderPath endswith "\\vsls-agent.exe") and (not(ProcessCommandLine contains "Microsoft.VisualStudio.LiveShare.Agent."))

tags.name: description
tags.value: Detects Microsoft Visual Studio vsls-agent.exe lolbin execution with a suspicious library load using the --agentExtensionPath parame
